name: Among Us VR
abstract: Among Us VR is a party game of teamwork and betrayal.

detail.app_developer: Schell Games, Innersloth LLC, and Robot Teddy
detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish, Italian
detail.app_release_note:
**LIMITED TIME EVENT — CONTAINMENT**
Sound the alarms! The next Limited Time Event: Containment is here! This is no longer a matter of Crewmates versus Impostors — it’s Bean Against the Environment!
— New limited time event has been added: Containment is a new mode where you’re not just playing against other Crewmates, but the map itself!
— Two new rooms have been added into the mix: explore the expansive new lobby in the Hangar and take inventory with a brand new task in the dedicated Vault, filled with all sorts of bean goodies and precious cargo!

**WARDROBE UPDATES**
We’re continuing to add more and more options to your wardrobe and bean customization!
— The Limited Time Pack: Containment is available with the Hazard Wear gloves and Hazard Wear hat to get your bean wrapped up in cautious cosmetics! Warning: this pack is only available for a limited time!
— The Combo Pack: Squeaky Clean DLC is now available for purchase, giving you six fresh and clean wardrobe options for your bean.
